page.title: 03KINGMOOR TRANSPORT 1
page.content: {KINGMOOR TRANSPORT 1 {Bus Services}The main depot is in the city centre.There are 5 bus stops in Lowry Hill.The buses run 6 days a week.The bus stops in Lowry Hill are not covered like the ones in the centre of the town.There is only 1 bus route to Cargo & 1 to Harker. {Kingmoor Marshalling Yard}used to be one of the largest in Europe.It caters for all types of freight.The marshalling yard was developed in 1959. {The M6}is a by_pass for Carlisle. It reduces traffic on Kingstown Road which makes travelling for the people who live on Lowry Hill easier & safer. {Carlisle Airport}is situated approx 5 miles out of Carlisle.It lies due northeast of the city. It is mainly used for private aircraft.Its main passenger service is the Data Post.
